message: فيه حد جرب Wordpress مع Postgresql يقدر يقولنا عن إذا كان فيه مشاكل واضحة حصلت؟

data.message: انت قصدك ان وردبريس يكون شغال مع داتابيس postgres؟ لو ده قصدك فلا ده مينفعش

لو انا فاكر صح انت هتعدل فى ال core وماعرفش هيبقى اية النظام مع ال updates 
بس طالما رايح PostgreSQL بالمرة بقى روح Drupal ولا حاجة انظف شوية من WP :D

طيب هو حوار لكن الفكرة في المشاكل اللي ممكن تواجهني بعد تضيع الوقت:
https://wiki.postgresql.org/wiki/Wordpress
https://codex.wordpress.org/Using_Alternative_Databases#Extend_to_support_PostgreSQL

Nightmare!

No native support. And there's an old plugin you can use, but it didn't be updated a long time ago.
No it is a nightmare of tweaking the core the syntax is kinda different , you can use mariadb as an alternative to MySQL
Even if you did all the modifications to the core what about the plugins ? And future updates ?
why are you interested in postgresql for WP? if you have issues with mysql try mariadb may be
I'm using Heroku and their option to support MySQL is ClearDB which gives me only 5 MB storage, I thought about using a remote MySQL server though ...
I don't you might need anything more than mysql for wordpress to be clear :)
one word, stay clear of Postgres, try MySQL

The main value of WordPress is the huge ecosystem. To play nicely with that, you don't want obscure things that might not be compatible with some plugins etc. And I don't assume there's a huge return anyway.

You are better off optimizing the MySQL engine the WP blog is using. Maybe optimizing the storage engine it uses, and maybe switching to something like MariaDB (which is still MySQL on the surface).
